analysis.description:
TimeLockPool.withdraw (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#578-612) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! account.send(release_amount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#601-603)

TokenSale.finalization (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#1199-1201) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- poolAddr.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#1200-1201)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol:
	Contract TokenSaleManager has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#899-901)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in TokenSale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#1205-1218):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenSaleManager(managerAddr).mint(_beneficiary,instant)) (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#1214)
	- require(bool)(TokenSaleManager(managerAddr).mintTimeLocked(_beneficiary,time_locked,timeLockEnd)) (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#1215-1218)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensMinted (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol)

Reentrancy in TokenSaleManager.addTokenSale (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#927-953):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokenSales.length == 0 || TimedCrowdsale(tokenSales[tokenSales.length - 1]).closingTime() < openingTime) (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#936-941)
	- require(bool)(TokenController(tokenControllerAddr).state() == TokenController.State.Init) (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#941-942)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenSales (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#943-949)

Reentrancy in TokenSaleManager.finalizeTokenSaleManager (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#1050-1061):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(tokenControllerAddr).closeTokensale()) (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#1055-1060)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#1060)

Reentrancy in TokenSaleManager.initialize (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#955-958):
	External calls:
	- TokenSale(tokenSales[0]).initialize(0) (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#956-957)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#106-110) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#110)

TokenSaleManager.addToWhitelist has external calls inside a loop:
	- WhitelistedCrowdsale(tokenSales[i]).addToWhitelist(_beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#1003-1005)

TokenSaleManager.addManyToWhitelist has external calls inside a loop:
	- WhitelistedCrowdsale(tokenSales[i]).addManyToWhitelist(_beneficiaries) (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#1012-1016)

TokenSaleManager.finalizeTokenSaleManager has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(FinalizableCrowdsale(tokenSales[i]).isFinalized()) (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#1053-1054)

	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokenSales.length == 0 || TimedCrowdsale(tokenSales[tokenSales.length - 1]).closingTime() < openingTime) (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#936-941)
	- require(bool)(TokenController(tokenControllerAddr).state() == TokenController.State.Init) (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#941-942)
	State variables written after the call(s):

	External calls:

TimeLockPool.withdraw (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#578-612) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- lockedBalances[account][tokenAddr][i].balance > 0 && lockedBalances[account][tokenAddr][i].releaseTime <= block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#589-599)

TimeLockPool.getAvailableBalanceOf (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#620-633) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- lockedBalances[account][tokenAddr][i].releaseTime <= block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#628-632)

TimeLockPool.getLockedBalanceOf (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#641-653) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- lockedBalances[account][tokenAddr][i].releaseTime > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#650-652)

TimeLockPool.getNextReleaseTimeOf (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#660-690) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- lockedBalances[account][tokenAddr][i].releaseTime > block.timestamp && lockedBalances[account][tokenAddr][i].releaseTime < nextRelease (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#676-684)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#707-716) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#708)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#722-725) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/9/0x87cf2332f4e4cd44cbf33be0979c0cb1be2e592f.sol#724-725)
